title: Easy Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['1 (500g) tub chicken stock', '350ml (12 fl oz) tomato juice', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', '1 large potato, diced', '2 carrots, sliced', '2 stalks celery, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '100g (4 oz) fresh green beans, chopped', '150 (5 oz) frozen sweetcorn', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'Cajun seasoning to taste (optional)']
